Articles.Content:
Im gonna go down into the crater to try to find evidence of the vent. Its safe, right?

going to a british persons home and making them tea by MICROWAVING it for them.

134010202023

new page

Edited October 20, 2023 by AlamoVampire

"Tea? Yeah, I know how to make it. You like, microwave the cup, right?"

Selling Alaska to the United States.

We'll be fine, this thing hasn't erupted in 6 million yea- *rumble* *checks notes* or was it 6 days

Forgetting parachutes after a grand tour of the solar system... in RSS.

On 10/21/2023 at 8:53 AM, TwoCalories said:

Selling Alaska to the United States.

We already have Siberia, who needs Alaska?

On 10/21/2023 at 2:58 PM, Kimera Industries said:

Forgetting parachutes after a grand tour of the solar system... in RSS.

I am sure my craft has enough drag already.

 

Playing with a Hula Hoop in San Fransisco.

relax, 

this ship is unsinkable!

Gonna go out to sea at night. Whats the worst that can happen?

offering to buy a termite wood

174210232023

Yo, look at my new friends!

insulting @HarvesteR

<Submit Reply> "Hehehehe, I'm such a troll-" *sound of entire army of KSP fans and the KSP1 and 2 developers marching to your door*

Going on a submarine not approved by any regulatory body, built with inadequate hull materials and off-the-shelf components.

Just going to pay an obscene amount of money and try not to desecrate any monument….<catastrophic implosion>
 

going pspsps while holding a bag of catnip

214910232023

"Hey, my cats will like this-" *Thunderous sound of disaster careening down the hallway*

Realizing the FAA won't let you launch your new rocket because paperwork.

They never said I can't blow it up!

Just existing in general

Hey, life isn't so bad- *realizes DLC hinges are full of bugs* AAAAHHH *discovers mods* oh *mod install fails* AAAAHHH

Realizing your rocket landed fine only to have wind and bad weather blow it off the drone ship

i mean its landed fine *rocket tips over*

 

oooh loook at the cool red rock wait why is it moving

There is no life on Mars.

Hula hooping in a really hilly city.

<stands atop a steep hill> i think i can hula…<falls>
 

eating a huge meal then going on a joy ride aerobatic flight in a biplane. <think the scene with tommy lee jones in space cowboys where that kid buys a similar flight as clint eastwood comes looking for jones>
 

001110262023

ugh that was gross <throws up again>

 

you know wait the rockets about to fire you better get out of the wa-

You are now Kerbal toast

The game crashing right as you are about to quicksave

"After two days without sleep and barely enough food and water, I've finally finished my RSS grand tour! Just gonna F5-" *crashes and loses all progress* "GDHS KJDSKJHADHSJADSJKHJHDGFSAJHKFAGSDHJKDFSAJKHDSFJKH

DFSHJKAHKJDFSAHJKFDSJHKHJK" *explodes*

Landing on the Mun's south pole.

"Hey, the one Mun biome that I haven't explored is the poles. This will be easy peasy, in fact, I bet it'll be easier than Minmus' plains!"

Activating your gravity ring only to create Kraken bait.

why is my station jelly

 

discovering images.nasa.gov

"Psh, I've literally like, seen all the space images- what!? Russia had a Venus lander? Europe is sending a probe to Mercury? NASA already launched Orion as a test?  America landed on the moon?"

Launching a Mars probe only to have it be lost because of an error in conversion between imperial and metric.

"Metric? Whose flag is on the Moon?"

Losing a freaking F-35 fighter jet.

12 minutes ago, TwoCalories said:

"Metric? Whose flag is on the Moon?"

Would just like to point out that America landed on the Moon using metric, sooo...

 

"Guys, I'll just screenshot the co-ords he ejected at." *his computer can't screenshot* "Ok, um, I'll take a picture with my phone." *his phone is dead* *power goes out and computer crashes* 

Incorrectly installing 100 mods and then learning about CKAN

*Several hours and a corrupted PC later* "You're telling me this has been here the whole time."

Doing on-street parking with your brand-new car and then hearing an action-movie car chase coming.

16 hours ago, Kimera Industries said:

Would just like to point out that America landed on the Moon using metric, sooo...

Well, those Lockheed Martin engineers in 1998 would like to object...

This is America and an American probe. Im not using the silly metric system. It wont matter.

trying to pet a cats belly
